emailInfoMenu.description: Context menu entry for showing email information

classifyMenu.description: Context menu entry for classifying an email

trainTagMenu.description: Context menu entry for training an email with a specific tag

learnTagMenu.description: Submenu entry for marking an email as a specific tag

unlearnTagMenu.description: Submenu entry for marking an email as not a specific tag

trainingCompleteMessage.description: Popup message after completing training for a tag

untrainingCompleteMessage.description: Popup message after completing untraining for a tag

popup_settingsButton.description: Text for the settings button in the popup

popup_helpButton.description: Text for the Help button in the popup

setting_autoTagTitle.description: Title for automatic tagging of emails

setting_autoTagTooltip.message: Check new emails for learned tags and tag them accordingly.

setting_selectTagsTooltip.message: Select the tags to be used for training and automatic tagging.

setting_thresholdTooltip.message: This value defines the probability at which a tag will be applied. It is recommended to keep the value at 99%.

setting_thresholdLabel.description: Label for the threshold input field

setting_setTagsTitle.description: Title for the apply tags section

setting_tagOnTrainingLabel.description: Label for automatically applying tags during training

setting_tagOnTrainingTooltip.message: If enabled, the corresponding tag will be applied or removed during training.
setting_tagOnTrainingTooltip.description: Tooltip for applying tags during training

setting_removeOnClassifyLabel.message: Remove set tags when classifying if probability is below threshold
setting_removeOnClassifyLabel.description: Label for removing tags during classification

setting_removeOnClassifyTooltip.message: If enabled, applied tags will be removed if the probability is below the threshold.
setting_removeOnClassifyTooltip.description: Tooltip for removing tags during classification

setting_backupRestoreTitle.description: Title for the backup and restore section

setting_backupButton.description: Button for backing up training data

settings_defaultOption.description: Default option in the dropdown list

settings_stopDeletion.description: Button text during the deletion countdown

settings_noTrainingData.description: Warning when no training data exists for the selected tag

settings_loadTrainingDataError.message: Error loading training data. Please try again.
settings_loadTrainingDataError.description: Error message when loading training data

settings_trainingDataDeleted.message: Training data for $1 has been deleted.
settings_trainingDataDeleted.description: Confirmation message after training data is deleted

settings_deleteTrainingDataError.description: Error message when deleting training data

settings_invalidThreshold.message: Please enter a valid threshold between 1 and 99.
settings_invalidThreshold.description: Warning when an invalid threshold is entered

settings_saved.description: Confirmation message after settings are saved

settings_saveError.message: Error saving settings. Please try again.

settingsx_defaultOption.description: Default option in the dropdown list

settingsx_stopDeletion.description: Button text during the deletion countdown

settingsx_backupSuccess.description: Confirmation message after training data is successfully backed up

settingsx_backupError.message: Error backing up training data. Please try again.

settingsx_restoreSuccess.description: Confirmation message after training data is successfully restored

settingsx_restoreError.message: Error restoring training data. Please try again.

settingsx_invalidDataError.description: Error message for invalid data structure in the restored file

settingsx_invalidZipError.message: Error processing ZIP file. Please ensure it is a valid ZIP file.
settingsx_invalidZipError.description: Error message for an invalid ZIP file

settingsx_noTrainingData.description: Warning when no training data exists for the selected tag

settingsx_loadTrainingDataError.message: Error loading training data. Please try again.
settingsx_loadTrainingDataError.description: Error message when loading training data

settingsx_trainingDataDeleted.message: Training data for $1 has been deleted.
settingsx_trainingDataDeleted.description: Confirmation message after training data is deleted

settingsx_deleteTrainingDataError.description: Error message when deleting training data

emailinfo_title.description: Title for the email info page

emailinfo_label_known_tokens.description: Label for the column showing the percentage of known tokens

emailinfo_top_tokens.description: Title of the token table for a specific tag

emailinfo_token.description: Column header for the token column

emailinfo_probability.description: Column header for the probability column
